statements: SELECT patient_id, patient_name, treatment_history FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name FROM patient_records
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_records
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_history->>'last_treatment' FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, jsonb_array_elements_text(treatment_history->'medications') AS medication FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, COUNT(jsonb_array_elements(treatment_history->'medications')) AS medication_count FROM patient_records GROUP BY patient_id, patient_name;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date, treatment_description, doctor_name FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_records WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date > '2022-01-01' AND patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patient_records WHERE age > 40);

SELECT patient_name, treatment_description, doctor_name FROM patient_records JOIN treatment_history ON patient_records.patient_id = treatment_history.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patient_records WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT treatment_id, treatment_type, diagnosis FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patients.first_name, treatments.treatment_date, treatments.treatment_type FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE treatments.doctor_id = 1;

SELECT doctors.specialty, patients.first_name, patients.last_name FROM doctors JOIN treatments ON doctors.doctor_id = treatments.doctor_id JOIN patients ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE doctors.specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, blood_type FROM patients WHERE blood_type IN ('A+', 'AB+');
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE gender='FEMALE';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT treatment_description, treatment_cost FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_cost > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_cost > 1000;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty IS NOT NULL ORDER BY doctor_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE LENGTH(medical_history) > 100;
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization, location FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT hospital_name, location FROM Hospitals ORDER BY hospital_name;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_name FROM Patients JOIN Appointments ON Patients.patient_id = Appointments.patient_id JOIN Doctors ON Appointments.doctor_id = Doctors.doctor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Hospitals;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
